about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Solex Energy Limited Anand, Gujrat based company engaged in the business of providing renewable energy solutions, specialized in the manufacturing of Solar photovoltaic module, solar home light, solar street light, solar lantern, solar power plant, solar invertors, solar water heating systems and wood fired water heater etc. Company has manufacturing facilities is located at Anand, Gujarat from where from where it offers appliances in different specifications and customization in accordance with the demands of its customers.

Solex Energy Limited is an ISO 14001:2015 Certification, ISO 9001:2015 Certification, OHSAS 18001:2007 and CE MARK CERTIFIED offering systems of high quality and reliability. Solex modules are TUV certified & tested by the UL India Pvt. Ltd and comply in accordance with the standards.

Solex Energy’s product ranges from Solar PV Module (3WP - 325 WP), Solar Lanterns (CFL & LED Base), Solar Home Light System (CFL & LED Base), Solar Street Light System (CFL & LED Base), Solar Off-Grid Power Plant (Solar Rooftop Systems), Solar Grid Connected Power Plant, Solar Water Heater Flat Plant Collector, Solar Water Heater ETC Type, Solar Submersible Pump (AC & DC), Solar Surface Pump (DC). Company also provides solution for solar roof top system, solar home and rural lighting system, solar power pack and solar power plant.

faqs.question: What is the Solex Energy IPO?
faqs.answer:
Solex Energy IPO is a SME IPO of 1380000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.18 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹52 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on January 22, 2018, and closes on January 25, 2018.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Solex Energy IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Solex Energy IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Solex Energy IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Solex Energy IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Solex Energy IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: Solex Energy IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Solex Energy IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Solex Energy IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
